name: Rep. Cheri Bustos

As we worked to rally support for the bill, 56 Attorneys General from all 50 states, territories and D.C. called for its passage in 2018.¬†

name: Rep. Cheri Bustos
tweet_text: The Capitol was stormed and our democracy ‚Äî the foundation of America ‚Äî was threatened.

name: Rep. Cheri Bustos
tweet_text:
‚ÄúGet your gas masks out.‚Äù

It was Jan 6 and I was at the Capitol working to certify the 2020 election results ‚Äî my constitutional duty. The violence forced us to pause our work.
